What is the outlook for Hypotonia ?,"Hypotonia can be a life-long condition. In some cases, however, muscle tone improves over time.",NINDS,Hypotonia
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Hypotonia ?,"The NINDS supports research on conditions that can result from neurological disorders, such as hypotonia. Much of this research is aimed at learning more about these
